Title: The Opposite of Sex
Actors: Christina Ricci, Martin Donovan, Lisa Kudrow, Lyle Lovett
Plot: A 16 year old Louisiana girl moves in with her homosexual half-brother and immediately starts coming on to his sexual partner, finally forcing him into an affair in which she becomes pregnant. The whole affair blows into a scandal exposing her school teacher brother and the true parent of the child is called into question as it is revealed that there have been a series of lovers.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 14 wins & 23 nominations.
